The maximum weaponfire allowed to be shot from a rapid fire weapon 
is 25 shots. (quite weak shots at that) So, there are really only 25 
fireblasts heading at Skyburst, not 50.

In Beast Wars, it took from 1-4 missiles to KO a bot. The damamge is 
significantly less here, but anyone who takes two missiles (for 
example) is going to be hurtin. That brings me to accepting damage. 

Also, transforming and firing is ok, BUT firing, transforming, and 
firing again is pushing the limits. Remember that your posts are 
instantaneous, or close to it, so they happen really quickly.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Hottie4u2have1@a... wrote:
> D-13 easily avoids the shots.D-13 transforms and fires his laser 
25 times at 
> Skyburst transforms back into dragon mode and shoots 50 fire 
blasts at 
> skyburst for good measure then starts flying to where he is.
